slide.title: Remote debugging log

list.bullet: In Xdebug 2.2dev, also shows connection attempts and failures:

slide.example:
xdebug.remote_connect_back=0 xdebug.remote_host=doesnotexist xdebug.remote_port=9002
I: Connecting to configured address/port: doesnotexist:9002. E: Could not connect to client. :-(

xdebug.remote_connect_back=1 xdebug.remote_host=doesnotexist2 xdebug.remote_port=9003
I: Checking remote connect back address. W: Remote address not found, connecting to configured address/port: doesnotexist2:9003. :-| E: Could not connect to client. :-(

xdebug.remote_connect_back=0 xdebug.remote_port=9991
I: Connecting to configured address/port: localhost:9991. I: Connected to client. :-)
